caption.title: Comparison of NDVI trends over the globally vegetated areas between two periods of 1982–1998 and 1999–2015.
caption.p: ( A) NDVI trend of 1982–1998. ( B) NDVI trend of 1999–2015. ( C) Differences of NDVI trend between 1999–2015 and 1982–1998. The insets (I) show the relative frequency (%) distribution of significant decreases (Dec*; P < 0.05), decreases (Dec), increases (Inc), and significant increases (Inc*), and the insets (II) show the frequency distributions of the corresponding ranges.
